verses.verse: Joseph <S%H3130><s%> was brought down <S%H3381><s%> to Egypt. <S%H4714><s%> Potiphar, <S%H6318><s%> an officer <S%H5631><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>'s, the captain <S%H8269><s%> of the guard, <S%H2876><s%> an Egyptian, <S%H376><s%> bought <S%H7069><s%> him from the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Ishmaelites <S%H3459><s%> that had brought him down there. <S%H3381><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> was with Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> and he was a prosperous <S%H6743><s%> man. <S%H376><s%> He was in the house <S%H1004><s%> of his master <S%H113><s%> the Egyptian. <S%H4713><s%>
His master <S%H113><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> was with him, <S%H3068><s%> and that Yahweh made all that he did <S%H6213><s%> prosper <S%H6743><s%> in his hand. <S%H3027><s%>

Joseph <S%H3130><s%> found <S%H4672><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> in his sight. <S%H5869><s%> He ministered <S%H8334><s%> to him, <S%H6485><s%> and he made him overseer over his house, <S%H1004><s%> and all that he had <S%H3426><s%> he put <S%H5414><s%> into his hand. <S%H3027><s%>

It happened from the time <S%H227><s%> that he made him overseer <S%H6485><s%> in his house, <S%H1004><s%> and over all that he had, <S%H3426><s%> that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> the Egyptian <S%H4713><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%> for Joseph <S%H3130><s%>'s sake; <S%H1558><s%> and the blessing <S%H1293><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> was on all that he had, <S%H3426><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> and in the field. <S%H7704><s%>

He left <S%H5800><s%> all that he had in Joseph <S%H3130><s%>'s hand. <S%H3027><s%> He didn't <S%H3045><s%> concern <S%H3972><s%> himself with anything, <S%H518><s%> except for the food <S%H3899><s%> which he ate. <S%H398><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%> was well-built <S%H8389><s%> and <S%H3303><s%> handsome. <S%H4758><s%>

It happened after <S%H310><s%> these things, <S%H1697><s%> that his master <S%H113><s%>'s wife <S%H802><s%> cast <S%H5375><s%> her eyes <S%H5869><s%> on Joseph; <S%H3130><s%> and she said, <S%H559><s%> "Lie with me. <S%H7901><s%>"

But he refused, <S%H3985><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to his master <S%H113><s%>'s wife, <S%H802><s%> "Behold, <S%H113><s%> my master doesn't <S%H3045><s%> know what is with me in the house, <S%H1004><s%> and he has put <S%H5414><s%> all that he has <S%H3426><s%> into my hand. <S%H3027><s%>

He isn't <S%H1419><s%> greater in this house <S%H1004><s%> than I, <S%H3808><s%> neither has he kept back <S%H2820><s%> anything from me but you, <S%H859><s%> because <S%H834><s%> you <S%H859><s%> are his wife. <S%H802><s%> How then can I do <S%H6213><s%> this great <S%H1419><s%> wickedness, <S%H7451><s%> and sin <S%H2398><s%> against God? <S%H430><s%>"
As she spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Joseph <S%H3130><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> by day, <S%H3117><s%> he didn't <S%H7901><s%> listen to her, to lie by her, <S%H681><s%> or to be with her. <S%H681><s%>

About this time, <S%H3117><s%> he went <S%H935><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> his work, <S%H4399><s%> and there were none of the men <S%H376><s%> of the house inside. <S%H1004><s%>

She caught <S%H8610><s%> him by his garment, <S%H899><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Lie <S%H7901><s%> with me! <S%H5800><s%>" He left his garment <S%H899><s%> in her hand, <S%H3027><s%> and <S%H5127><s%> ran <S%H3318><s%> outside. <S%H2351><s%>
When she saw <S%H7200><s%> that he had left <S%H5800><s%> his garment <S%H899><s%> in her hand, <S%H3027><s%> and had run <S%H5127><s%> outside, <S%H2351><s%>

she called <S%H7121><s%> to the men <S%H582><s%> of her house, <S%H1004><s%> and spoke <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H559><s%> saying, "Behold, <S%H7200><s%> he has brought in <S%H935><s%> a Hebrew <S%H376><s%> to us to mock <S%H6711><s%> us. <S%H935><s%> He came in to me to lie <S%H7901><s%> with me, <S%H7121><s%> and I cried with a loud <S%H1419><s%> voice. <S%H6963><s%>

It happened, <S%H8085><s%> when he heard that I lifted up <S%H7311><s%> my voice <S%H6963><s%> and cried, <S%H7121><s%> that he left <S%H5800><s%> his garment <S%H899><s%> by me, <S%H681><s%> and <S%H5127><s%> ran <S%H3318><s%> outside. <S%H2351><s%>"
She laid up <S%H3240><s%> his garment <S%H899><s%> by her, <S%H681><s%> until his master <S%H113><s%> came <S%H935><s%> home. <S%H1004><s%>

She spoke <S%H1696><s%> to him according to these words, <S%H1697><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "The Hebrew <S%H5680><s%> servant, <S%H5650><s%> whom you have brought <S%H935><s%> to us, <S%H935><s%> came in to me to mock me, <S%H6711><s%>

and it happened, <S%H7311><s%> as I lifted up my voice <S%H6963><s%> and cried, <S%H7121><s%> that he left <S%H5800><s%> his garment <S%H899><s%> by me, <S%H681><s%> and ran <S%H5127><s%> outside. <S%H2351><s%>"

It happened, <S%H113><s%> when his master heard <S%H8085><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of his wife, <S%H802><s%> which she spoke <S%H1696><s%> to him, <S%H559><s%> saying, "This is what <S%H1697><s%> your servant <S%H5650><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> to me, <S%H639><s%>" that his wrath was kindled. <S%H2734><s%>

Joseph <S%H113><s%>'s master took him, and put <S%H8085><s%> him into <S%H1697><s%> the prison, <S%H802><s%> the place where the <S%H1696><s%> king <S%H559><s%>'s prisoners were bound, <S%H1697><s%> and he was there <S%H5650><s%> in <S%H6213><s%> custody. <S%H1004><s%>

But Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> was with Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> and showed <S%H5186><s%> kindness <S%H2617><s%> to him, <S%H5414><s%> and gave him favor <S%H2580><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the keeper <S%H8269><s%> of the prison. <S%H1004><s%>

The keeper <S%H8269><s%> of the prison <S%H1004><s%> committed <S%H5414><s%> to Joseph <S%H3130><s%>'s hand <S%H3027><s%> all the prisoners <S%H615><s%> who were in the prison. <S%H1004><s%> Whatever they did <S%H6213><s%> there, <S%H6213><s%> he was responsible for it.

The keeper <S%H8269><s%> of the prison <S%H1004><s%> didn't <S%H7200><s%> look after anything <S%H3972><s%> that was under his hand, <S%H3027><s%> because Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> was with him; <S%H6213><s%> and that which he did, Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> made it prosper. <S%H6743><s%>
